summary: The musical duo of Goopi and Bagha make a comeback when they are invited to play for a king.
cast: Soumitra Chatterjee|Utpal Dutt|Rabi Ghosh|Tapan Chatterjee|Santosh Dutta|Ajoy Banerjee|Bimal Banerjee|Daya Banerjee|Ratan Banerjee|Samaresh Banerjee|Anindya Basu|Govinda Chakravarti|Abhijit Chatterjee|Bimal Chatterjee|Kartik Chatterjee|Koushik Chatterjee|Sachin Chatterjee|Bikramjit Das|Robin Kumar Das|Samudra Dasgupta|Bimal Deb|Ashok Kumar Dey|Gopal Dey|Kumardeb Dutta|Subal Dutta|Shailen Ganguli|Anindya Ganguly|Noni Ganguly|Promode Ganguly|Rajib Ganguly|Koushik Ghosh|Shankar Ghosh|Alpana Gupta|Rajkumar Lahiri|Robin Majumdar|Shoumik Nandy Majumdar|Tarun Mitra|Anup Mukherjee|Arup Mukherjee|Haridhan Mukherjee|Kamu Mukherjee|Manas Mukherjee|Samir Mukherjee|Somenath Mukherjee|Rahul Roy|Krishnapada Saha|Rudranarayan Saha|Sunil Sarkar
title: Heerak Rajar Deshe
